description: This is the main React component file for the Fruit Ninja Online web game frontend. It manages high-level application state, theme toggling, screen navigation, and integration with a health-check API.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the app, manages state, and handles navigation and theme.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleGoHome
methods.description: Sets the screen to the home screen.

methods.name: handleStartSolo
methods.description: Starts a solo game by setting the screen and resetting results.

methods.name: handleStartMultiplayerMatch
methods.description: Begins a multiplayer match; currently UI-only.

methods.name: handleGameOver
methods.description: Handles game over event, sets results, and shows results screen.
